betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oThis will be the first Project, or will it be?§r

The §3Coke Oven§r makes §aCoke from Coal§r, or §aCharcoal from Wood§r, in addition to §dCreosote§r as bonus§r output.
§dCreosote§r can be used as furnace fuel to§6 smelt 32 items§r, and is required for making §dTreated Wood Planks§r (rings a bell?).

The amount of resources required is listed in the first §eoptional§r task.
Check the §2JEI Multiblock Preview§r for the structure pattern.

§9Note:§r §lAny§r Brick block can be replaced with a §3Coke Oven Hatch§r as seen in the last §eoptional§r task. You can have up to five of them.
The Hatch allows for automation. It will §dauto-export§r both Fluid and Items with it! It also works for insertion into the Coke Oven (you can use Hoppers).


If the Coke Oven happens to fully fill up on Creosote that you are not using, break and replace the Coke Oven block. Automated fluid voiding is available later in the game.


§bLore:§r The concept of Multiblocks is very old in modded Minecraft. Think of IndustrialCraft 2's Nuclear Reactor, or Railcraft's Coke Oven; they were revolutionary at the time.
